chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has a problem:
Device is stuck in boot loop. Apple logo displays permanently. Can't be turned off.

Thank you,

Hello, ecomobile:

I hope you are feeling well.

According to the tracking link, the package was successfully delivered, could you please give us more details.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Have a nice day.

Sincerely
Diego, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We have confirmed receipt of the parcel and we are currently processing the device. Thank you for your patience.

Regards,
CH

Hola, agente
El vendedor no puede proceder al reenvío debido al siguiente motivo:
El artículo está bloqueado por un código o patrón.
Se ha añadido más información en este mensaje: Dear Backcare,

The phone is locked with a code. Kindly assist the customer in unlocking their device. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Hello, ecomobile:

I do see that the device still has customer personal data: 
- iCloud data sill on the device
- passcode or password to unlock the device

To ensure the right handling of the device, please make sure to put the device in recovery mode and set it up again as explained in this article from Apple Support Help Center: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201263. Also, our technical experts have detailed the different situations to follow when you received an iCloud locked device here: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

FMIP being OFF. Activation Lock will not appear.

I will come back to you once I have news from the customer.

Diego from Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for your instructions in assisting to unlock the device, we will relay the information to our repair team and get back to you.

Regards,
JH

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
